body.text:
{% if colgate_ng_language_options == 'Others' and colgate_ng_other_language == '1' %}_[Q No. 2/2 ]_
Batutuwan da aka zaba: Ciwon hakori 
Zaɓi tambayoyin cikin jerin da ke ƙasa, don samun shawarwarin kula da baki

 1. Haƙori mai saurin daukar ciwo
 2. Ciwo a yayin goge baki
 3. Ciwo a yayin cin abinci
 4. Ciwon taunar hakori
 5. Ciwon hakori mai yaduwa{%else%}_[Q No. 2/2 ]_
Selected Topic: Pain in teeth

 Choose an option.

 1.Tooth sensitivity.
 2. Pain during brushing.
 3. Pain while eating.
 4. Teeth grinding pain.
 5. Spreading teeth pain.{%endif%}
